PackageOracle.name: DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.01.829378000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equipment_product_model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_voltage IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_length IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_height IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_width IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equipment_product_model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_voltage IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_length IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_height IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_width IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_voltage IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_length IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_height IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_width IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_network_equipment;

body.name: DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.01.841395000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equipment_product_model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_voltage IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_length IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_height IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_width IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment.add(fx), parms=' || equipment_product_model_nm || '|' || equipment_product_voltage || '|' || equipment_product_length || '|' || equipment_product_height || '|' || equipment_product_width || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_network_equipment a
(
a.network_equipment_product_id
,a.equipment_product_model_nm
,a.equipment_product_voltage
,a.equipment_product_length
,a.equipment_product_height
,a.equipment_product_width
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_network_equipment_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.equipment_product_model_nm
,add.equipment_product_voltage
,add.equipment_product_length
,add.equipment_product_height
,add.equipment_product_width
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.network_equipment_product_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equipment_product_model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_voltage IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_length IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_height IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_width IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment.add, parms=' || equipment_product_model_nm || '|' || equipment_product_voltage || '|' || equipment_product_length || '|' || equipment_product_height || '|' || equipment_product_width || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_network_equipment a
(
a.network_equipment_product_id
,a.equipment_product_model_nm
,a.equipment_product_voltage
,a.equipment_product_length
,a.equipment_product_height
,a.equipment_product_width
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_network_equipment_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.equipment_product_model_nm
,add.equipment_product_voltage
,add.equipment_product_length
,add.equipment_product_height
,add.equipment_product_width
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_voltage IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_length IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_height IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_product_width IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment.add, parms=' || network_equipment_product_id || '|' || equipment_product_model_nm || '|' || equipment_product_voltage || '|' || equipment_product_length || '|' || equipment_product_height || '|' || equipment_product_width || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_network_equipment a
(
a.network_equipment_product_id
,a.equipment_product_model_nm
,a.equipment_product_voltage
,a.equipment_product_length
,a.equipment_product_height
,a.equipment_product_width
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.network_equipment_product_id
,add.equipment_product_model_nm
,add.equipment_product_voltage
,add.equipment_product_length
,add.equipment_product_height
,add.equipment_product_width
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment.del, parms=' || network_equipment_product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_network_equipment a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.network_equipment_product_id = del.network_equipment_product_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment.del');

END del;

END da_network_equipment;
